members.member: Note that the IEnumerator documentation requires an InvalidOperationException to be thrown whenever the collection is modified. This has been done for changes in the size of the collection but not when one of the elements of the collection is modified as it is a bit tricky to detect unmanaged code that modifies the collection under our feet.

Note that the IEnumerator documentation requires an InvalidOperationException to be thrown whenever the collection is modified. This has been done for changes in the size of the collection but not when one of the elements of the collection is modified as it is a bit tricky to detect unmanaged code that modifies the collection under our feet.

Note that the IEnumerator documentation requires an InvalidOperationException to be thrown whenever the collection is modified. This has been done for changes in the size of the collection but not when one of the elements of the collection is modified as it is a bit tricky to detect unmanaged code that modifies the collection under our feet.

member.name: T:Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.AudioInputStreamFormat
member.summary: The Audio stream format.

member.name: F:Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.AudioInputStreamFormat.FormatTag
member.summary: The format of the audio, valid values: 1 (PCM)

member.name: F:Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.AudioInputStreamFormat.Channels
member.summary: The number of channels, valid values: 1 (Mono).

member.name: F:Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.AudioInputStreamFormat.SamplesPerSec
member.summary: The sample rate, valid values: 16000.

member.name: F:Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.AudioInputStreamFormat.AvgBytesPerSec
member.summary: Average bytes per second, usually calculated as nSamplesPerSec * nChannels * ceil(wBitsPerSample, 8).

member.name: F:Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.AudioInputStreamFormat.BlockAlign
member.summary: The size of a single frame, valid values: nChannels * ceil(wBitsPerSample, 8).

member.name: F:Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.AudioInputStreamFormat.BitsPerSample
member.summary: The bits per sample, valid values: 16

member.summary: Gets the format of this audio stream.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.AudioInputStream.Read(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Reads binary data from the stream.
member.returns: The number of bytes filled, or 0 in case the stream hits its end and there is no more data available. If there is no data immediate available, Read() blocks untils the next data becomes available.

member.summary: The event signals that an intermediate recognition result is received.

member.summary: The event signals that a final recognition result is received.

member.summary: The event signals that an error occurred during recognition.

member.summary: Gets the language name that was set when the recognizer was created.

member.summary: The collection of parameters and their values defined for this .

member.name: M:Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Intent.IntentRecognizer.RecognizeAsync
member.summary: Starts intent recognition, and stops after the first utterance is recognized. The task returns the recognition text and intent as result.
member.returns: A task representing the recognition operation. The task returns a value of

member.name: M:Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Intent.IntentRecognizer.StartContinuousRecognitionAsync
member.summary: Starts speech recognition on a continuous audio stream, until StopContinuousRecognitionAsync() is called. User must subscribe to events to receive recognition results.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation that starts the recognition.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Intent.IntentRecognizer.StopContinuousRecognitionAsync
member.summary: Stops continuous intent recognition.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation that stops the recognition.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Intent.IntentRecognizer.StartKeywordRecognitionAsync(Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.KeywordRecognitionModel)
member.summary: Starts speech recognition on a continuous audio stream with keyword spotting, until StopKeywordRecognitionAsync() is called. User must subscribe to events to receive recognition results. Note: Key word spotting functionality is only available on the Cognitive Services Device SDK. This functionality is currently not included in the SDK itself.
member.param: The keyword recognition model that specifies the keyword to be recognized.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation that starts the recognition.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Intent.IntentRecognizer.StopKeywordRecognitionAsync
member.summary: Stops continuous speech recognition with keyword spotting. Note: Key word spotting functionality is only available on the Cognitive Services Device SDK. This functionality is currently not included in the SDK itself.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation that stops the recognition.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Intent.IntentRecognizer.AddIntent(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a phrase that should be recognized as intent.
member.param: A string that represents the identifier of the intent to be recognized.
A string that specifies the phrase representing the intent.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Intent.IntentRecognizer.AddIntent(System.String,Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Intent.LanguageUnderstandingModel,System.String)
member.summary: Adds an intent from Language Understanding service for recognition.
member.param: A string that represents the identifier of the intent to be recognized.
The language understanding model from Language Understanding service.
The intent name defined in the language understanding model. If it is null, all intent names defined in the model will be added.

member.name: T:Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.SpeechFactory
member.summary: Factory methods to create recognizers.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.SpeechFactory.FromSubscription(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of the speech factory with specified subscription key and region.
member.returns: A speech factory instance.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.SpeechFactory.FromEndPoint(System.Uri,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of the speech factory with specified endpoint and subscription key. This method is intended only for users who use a non-standard service endpoint. Note: The query parameters specified in the endpoint URL are not changed, even if they are set by any other APIs. For example, if language is defined in uri as query parameter "language=de-DE", and also set by CreateSpeechRecognizer("en-US"), the language setting in uri takes precedence, and the effective language is "de-DE". Only the parameters that are not specified in the endpoint URL can be set by other APIs.
member.param: The service endpoint to connect to.
member.returns: A speech factory instance.

member.name: P:Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.SpeechFactory.SubscriptionKey
member.summary: Gets/sets the subscription key.

member.name: P:Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.SpeechFactory.AuthorizationToken
member.summary: Gets/sets the authorization token. If this is set, subscription key is ignored. User needs to make sure the provided authorization token is valid and not expired.

member.summary: Gets/gets the deployment id of a customized speech model that is used for speech recognition.

member.summary: Gets the language name that was set when the recognizer was created.

member.summary: The collection of parameters and their values defined for this .

member.name: M:Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizeAsync
member.summary: Starts speech recognition, and stops after the first utterance is recognized. The task returns the recognition text as result.
member.returns: A task representing the recognition operation. The task returns a value of

member.name: M:Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.SpeechRecognizer.StartContinuousRecognitionAsync
member.summary: Starts speech recognition on a continuous audio stream, until StopContinuousRecognitionAsync() is called. User must subscribe to events to receive recognition results.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation that starts the recognition.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.SpeechRecognizer.StopContinuousRecognitionAsync
member.summary: Stops continuous speech recognition.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation that stops the recognition.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.SpeechRecognizer.StartKeywordRecognitionAsync(Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.KeywordRecognitionModel)
member.summary: Starts speech recognition on a continuous audio stream with keyword spotting, until StopKeywordRecognitionAsync() is called. User must subscribe to events to receive recognition results. Note: Key word spotting functionality is only available on the Cognitive Services Device SDK. This functionality is currently not included in the SDK itself.
member.param: The keyword recognition model that specifies the keyword to be recognized.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation that starts the recognition.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.SpeechRecognizer.StopKeywordRecognitionAsync
member.summary: Stops continuous speech recognition with keyword spotting. Note: Key word spotting functionality is only available on the Cognitive Services Device SDK. This functionality is currently not included in the SDK itself.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation that stops the recognition.

member.name: F:Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Translation.SynthesisStatus.Success
member.summary: The response contains valid audio data.

member.name: F:Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Translation.SynthesisStatus.SynthesisEnd
member.summary: Indicates the end of audio data. No valid audio data is included in the message.

member.name: F:Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Translation.SynthesisStatus.Error
member.summary: Indicates an error occurred during synthesis data processing.

member.name: P:Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Translation.TranslationRecognizer.TargetLanguages
member.summary: Gets target languages for translation that were set when the recognizer was created. The language is specified in BCP-47 format. The translation will provide translated text for each of language.

member.summary: Gets/sets a boolean value which indicates whether a voice output of the translated text is desired.

member.summary: Starts recognition and translation, and stops after the first utterance is recognized. The task returns the translation text as result.
member.returns: A task representing the recognition operation. The task returns a value of

member.name: M:Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Translation.TranslationRecognizer.StartContinuousRecognitionAsync
member.summary: Starts recognition and translation on a continous audio stream, until StopContinuousRecognitionAsync() is called. User must subscribe to events to receive translation results.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation that starts the recognition.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Translation.TranslationRecognizer.StopContinuousRecognitionAsync
member.summary: Stops continuous recognition and translation.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation that stops the translation.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Translation.TranslationRecognizer.StartKeywordRecognitionAsync(Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.KeywordRecognitionModel)
member.summary: Starts speech recognition on a continuous audio stream with keyword spotting, until StopKeywordRecognitionAsync() is called. User must subscribe to events to receive recognition results. Note: Key word spotting functionality is only available on the Cognitive Services Device SDK. This functionality is currently not included in the SDK itself.
member.param: The keyword recognition model that specifies the keyword to be recognized.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation that starts the recognition.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Translation.TranslationRecognizer.StopKeywordRecognitionAsync
member.summary: Stops continuous speech recognition with keyword spotting. Note: Key word spotting functionality is only available on the Cognitive Services Device SDK. This functionality is currently not included in the SDK itself.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation that stops the recognition.
